price: (Nkͻmhyεni), Yɛasiane Nhyira Nwoma no ama wo, sεdeε wͻbεdwen emu nsεm no ho, na afei nnipa mu mmadwemmafoͻ no de bɛtu wͻn ho foͻ.
arabic: كِتَٰبٌ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُ إِلَيۡكَ مُبَٰرَكٞ لِّيَدَّبَّرُوٓاْ ءَايَٰتِهِۦ وَلِيَتَذَكَّرَ أُوْلُواْ ٱلۡأَلۡبَٰبِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: kitābun anzalnāhu ilayka mubārakun liyaddabbarū āyātihi waliyatadhakkara ulū al-albābi
